item.title: [unf] Plate Spinning
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a spell, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy. Then balance a card from outside the game on one of your fingertips. When that card falls or touches another card, sacrifice Plate Spinning.

https://t.bilibili.com/710073877933326357

item.title: [unf] Park Re-Entry
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to two target creature cards that each have a hat and/or mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

https://shopee.sg/wizardsofthecoast

item.title: [unf] ______ ______ ______ Trespasser
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Guest

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it.

{3}{U}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each name sticker on it. It can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [unf] Blue Ribbon
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Blue Ribbon enters the battlefield, as a person outside the game which creature you control is most deserving of a blue ribbon. Attach Blue Ribbon to that creature.

Equipped creature has best in show. (Whenever another creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may copy that spell or ability. If you do, the copy targets this creature.)

Equip {3}

https://www.reddit.com/r/magicTCG/comments/xojy0e/unf_blue_ribbon_rmagictcgs_unfinity_preview_card/

item.title: [unf] Urza's Fun House
item.description:
Land — Urza’s

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {∞}. Activate only once and only if you control an Urza's Mine, an Urza's Power-Plant, and an Urza's Tower.

{7}, {T}: Head to AskUrza.com and click Urza's Fun House.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-2-2022-09-26

item.title: [unf] Form of the Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. You become a card until you leave your library or that library is shuffled. Put yourself seventh from the top, balancing the cards on top of your head.

When you draw yourself, you win the game.

When one or more cards fall off your head, exile them and all cards on your head, then sacrifice this enchantment.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-2-2022-09-26

item.title: [unf] Tunnel of Love
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose an opponent. They choose a creature you control, then you choose a creature you control. You may exile the chosen creatures. If you do, return them to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Otherwise, the chosen creatures fight each other.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/unfinity

item.title: [unf] Tunnel of Love
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose an opponent. They choose a creature you control, then you choose a creature you control. You may exile the chosen creatures. If you do, return them to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Otherwise, the chosen creatures fight each other.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a weapon," "five or more creatures", or "words or numbers" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a vampire or zombie," "fire, lightning, or an explosion", or "a metallic creature" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "an elf or goblin," "a tail", or "a flying creature or flying vehicle" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a four-legged creature," "a liquid other than water", or "a door" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a creature wearing a hat," "a book or scroll", or "teeth" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Roxi, Publicist to the Stars
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Employee

Flying

Roxi, Publicist to the Stars power is equal to the number of permanents you control with an art sticker plus the number of cards in your graveyard with an art sticker.

When Roxi enters the battlefield, distribute up to two art stickers among one or two nonland permanents you own.

https://twitter.com/bajo/status/1573167337062400000

item.title: [unf] Monoxa, Midway Manager
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Employee

Whenever you roll a 3 or higher, Monoxa, Midway Manager gains first strike until end of turn. If the roll was 4 or higher, it gains menace until end of turn. If the roll was 5 or higher, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

{6}: Roll a six-sided die.

https://twitter.com/GavinVerhey/status/1573384084566712320

item.title: [unf] Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Employee

When Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

Whenever you roll a 2, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Whenever you roll a 4, you may tap or untap target artifact or creature.

Whenever you roll a 6, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573638554248421377

item.title: [unf] Captain Rex Nebula
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pilot Employee

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target nonland permanent you control becomes a Vehicle artifact until end of turn. Its base power and toughness are each equal to its mana value. It has crew 2 and "Crash Land — Whenever this Vehicle deals damage, roll a six-sided die. If the result is equal to this Vehicle's mana value, it deals that much damage to any target, then sacrifice this Vehicle."

https://twitter.com/day9tv/status/1573341434752663555

item.title: [unf] Goblin Airbrusher
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Employee

Whenever you place a sticker, create a Treasure token. If it's an art sticker, instead create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [unf] Trapeze Artist
item.description:
Creature — Human Performer

Flying

Trapeze Artist enters the battlefield by being flipped from a height of at least one foot (about 0.3 meters). If it lands face down or didn't turn over completely at least once, return it to its owner's hand.

https://www.instagram.com/p/Ci-j-39uKEL/

item.title: [unf] Spinnerette, Arachnobat
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spider Performer

Reach

When Spinnerette, Arachnobat enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

As long as you control three or more Attractions, Spinnerette, Arachnobat gets +2/+0 and has menace.

https://twitter.com/JackTorrance90/status/1574444014870450176

item.title: [unf] Strength-Testing Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, roll a six-sided die. That creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the result. Then if it has the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield, draw a card.

Equip {3}

https://twitter.com/JackTorrance90/status/1574444055781871616

item.title: [unf] Icing Manipulator
item.description:
Creature — Human Employee

Each +1/+1 counter on a creature you control is also a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

{3}{G}, {T}: Roll two six-sided dice. For each result, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature of your choice. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=458243406332415&set=a.451841636972592

item.title: [unf] Busted!
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of words in the name with the most words among permanents you control.

https://twitter.com/TheOneJame/status/1574452544260038656

item.title: [unf] Souvenir T-Shirt
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Gear Up, sponsored by Wizards of the Coast — As Souvenir T-Shirt enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. For each Magic-branded Item you're wearing, roll an additional six-sided die. Choose two of those results.

Equipped creature gets +X/+Y, where X is the first chosen result and Y is the second.

Equip {4}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MjJuDrYcQAc

item.title: [unf] Pair o' Dice Lost
item.description:
Instant

Roll two six-sided dice. Return any number of cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the total of those results. Exile Pair o' Dice Lost.

https://twitter.com/SpellTable/status/1574457370922876929

item.title: [unf] Standard Procedure
item.description:
Instant

{1}, Reveal Standard Procedure from your hand: Choose an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less currently legal in the Standard format. Standard Procedure becomes that card until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Ferris Wheel
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose target creature that hasn't been phased out with Ferris Wheel. That creature phases out until you roll a 3 or less while rolling to visit your Attractions.

https://twitter.com/Sci_Phile/status/1574464953343365120

item.title: [unf] Astroquarium
item.description:
Artifact

When Astroquarium enters the battlefield, you may put an art sticker on it.

{1}, {T}: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Shark with base power and toughness 4/4. If the cracks in Astroquarium's art are completely covered, that creature becomes a blue Octopus with base power and toughness 8/8 instead. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] Storybook Ride
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Attractions you've visited this turn (including this one). You may play those cards this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, put them on the bottom of your library in any order.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1574522488540782592

item.title: [unf] Storybook Ride
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Attractions you've visited this turn (including this one). You may play those cards this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, put them on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [unf] Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker
item.description:
Creature — Vedalken Guest

As Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die twice. Its base power becomes the first result and its base toughness becomes the second result.

If you would roll one or more six-sided dice, instead roll them and you may exchange one result with Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker's base power or base toughness.

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] It Came from Planet Glurg
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Alien Ooze

You may have It Came from Planet Glurg enter the battlefield as a copy of X different creatures on the battlefield. (It has their total power, total toughness, combined mana costs, all text boxes, names, art, and so on.)

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] Hardy of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Performer

As Hardy of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a number.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen number of lines of flavor text, put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
